com.brightcove.player.controller

Class BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.player.controller.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    @ListensFor(events={"didSetVideo","stop"})
@Emits(events={"captionsDialogOk","captionsDialogSettings","toggleClosedCaptions","captionsLanguages"})
public class BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController
extends AbstractComponent
